#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Q :
#Text=If you were elected as a " rookie " councillor ,
#Text=What would you bring to the table beyond the incumbent ?
#Text=A :

#Text=I would bring a determination always to keep an eye on long range goals and needs while focusing on achievable , immediate priorities , and not mortgage the future to finance a response to immediate short term political pressures .
#Text=Csaba Vegh
#Text=37-year-old Csaba Vegh is a private investigator .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Describe the three most important issues in your campaign .
#Text=A :
#Text=Property taxes , crime and traffic are three hot topic issues .
#Text=I believe that homeowners and businesses are being over taxed .
#Text=Generation of revenue is not a problem for the city , the way we spend taxpayers money needs to be re-evaluated .
#Text=We need to hire more police officers and we need to give them the resources to do their job effectively .
#Text=I believe that a city the size of Toronto should have at least one regularly operating police helicopter .
#Text=We can also address youth crime by giving our youth the opportunity to spend their time in healthful and productive ways .
#Text=I have suggested that the city should work with the school boards to open high school gyms to their student for after school activities .
#Text=Currently , a lot of school gyms are closed to students after school due to a lack of qualified supervisors .
#Text=Finally , infiltration of traffic onto the streets of Leaside have incresed [ sic ] drastically over the past few years .
#Text=I suggest reducing vehicular access to the streets of Leaside during peak hours for non-residents or their visitors .
#Text=I also support the construction of the Redway Rd . extension to ease traffic flow .
#Text=Q :
#Text=What one election issue do you feel is most relevant to your ward in this election ?
#Text=A :
#Text=As I mentioned before , I believe that that property taxes for homeowners and businesses need to be frozen .
#Text=We are being over taxed .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Why have you chosen to involve yourself in the political process ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I have lived in ward 26 for thirty years .
#Text=I have also attended school here , worked here , and I have been a volunteer football coach at Leaside High School since 1989 .
#Text=I believe that I can be a strong and effective voice for our community at City Hall without partisan influence because I am not a member of any political party .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Why do you want to represent this particular ward on council ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I have deep roots in the community .
#Text=Being a long time resident , I share the views and concerns of quite a number of the residents of Ward 26 .
#Text=Q :
#Text=How are you currently involved in the community ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I have been a volunteer football coach at Leaside High School since 1989 .
#Text=I am also a volunteer with the Scarborough Minor Football Association .
#Text=And , I have been a volunteer coach for the Leaside Hockey Association .
